title: Sidewall - Fragment, La Cassolette, ca. 1780
provenance: Acquired from the donor from a house on the French Riviera. Panel assembled from three fragments.
description: Arabesque design with at top a bouquet of roses and other flowers. Below this is a medallion in brown tones showing cupids at play, atop which are quiver and arrows and a torch, crossed. At bottom, an incense burner or "Cassolette".

tombstone.epitaph:
Sidewall - Fragment, La Cassolette, ca. 1780. Block-printed. 
1951-16-3-c,d.
